characterDescription: Re-Shephir is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. Also referred to as the Midnight Mother, she appears in the depths of Urithiru where she is discovered first by Renarin, then by Adolin, and lastly by Shallan, who eventually interacts with her.

characterDetails.Appearance:
Shallan sees a dark mass wriggling deep inside slits within the tower of Urithiru, squeezing between walls like goo, but with bits jutting out. These bits appear as elbows, ribs, fingers splayed along a wall, each knuckle bending backward.
The thing twists, head deforming in the tiny confines, and looks toward her. Shallan sees eyes reflecting her Stormlight, twin spheres set in a mashed head, a distorted human visage.
Later identified as Re-Shephir, she appears as a large mass that reflects the light, like glistening tar. She is an undulating shape, a living darkness that seeps, though not swiftly.
characterDetails.History:
Re-Shephir brutally murdered Vedekar Perel in the tower at Urithiru, in the same manner that Adolin had killed Sadeas.
Impersonating Veil in a long coat and a hat, Re-Shepir also stabbed Rock in the same manner that Shallan (as Veil) had stabbed a man, because Rock looked similar to that man.
characterDetails.Notes: Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
